fullDescription.intro: Freezes the parameters of the selected layers. If the model is trained afterwards the parameters of the selected layers are not updated. All other layers are set to trainable.

tab.name: Freeze Layers
tab.option: The list contains the layer names of the layers that should not be trainable in the output network.
Select to force the list of not trainable layers not to change. Even if other layers are added to the input network. Other layers are then added to the trainable layers list.
The list contains the layer names of the layers that should be trainable in the output network.
Select to force the list of trainable layers not to change. Even if other layers are added to the input network. Other layers are then added to the not trainable layers list.
Use a wildcard of Regular expression to select the layers which should be not trainable.

ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with the selected layers set to not-trainable and all other layers set to trainable.
